data.title: Fairfield Inn Omaha East & Council Bluffs
data.meta_description: Book a stay at Fairfield Inn & Suites Omaha East/Council Bluffs. Our hotel in Council Bluffs, IA offers an indoor pool, fitness center, and free breakfast.
data.text:
Welcome to Fairfield Inn & Suites Omaha East/Council Bluffs, IA

Simplify your travel at our hotel in Council Bluffs, Iowa

Unwind at Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott Omaha East/Council Bluffs, IA. Our hotel in Council Bluffs, IA, offers modern accommodations and amenities. Rest easy in our spacious rooms and suites with plush Marriott bedding, TVs with premium channels, and mini fridges. Maintain business as usual with in-room workspaces and free Wi-Fi, stay active with cardio equipment and free weights at our 24/7 fitness center, and go for a swim in our refreshing outdoor pool. Start your morning with our free hot breakfast, and explore nearby restaurants like Fazoli's, La Mesa, Pizza King, HuHot Mongolian Grill, and more. During your stay, enjoy easy access to Omaha Zoo, Mid-America Center, Creighton University, and more attractions near our hotel. Host events and meetings in our versatile event space, and ask about our discounted room rates when booking room blocks. No matter what brings you here, enjoy your stay at Fairfield Inn & Suites Omaha East/Council Bluffs, IA.
